import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Modal from 'react-modal' import { PeopleContext } from '../../actions/PeopleContext'; import { closeModal } from '../../actions/ui'; const customStyles = { content: { top: '50%', left: '50%', right: 'auto', bottom: 'auto', marginRight: '-50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', width: '70%', }, } export const AdoptModal = () => { const { dispatch } = useContext( PeopleContext ); const handleCloseModal = () => { dispatch( closeModal() ) } return (

New Person

) }
